original_text: (The Sadducees say that there is no resurrection, and that there are neither angels nor spirits, but the Pharisees believe all these things.)
korean_text: 이는 사두개인은 부활도 없고 천사도 없고 영도 없다 하고 바리새인은 다 있다 함이라

sentences.original_text: The Sadducees say that there is no resurrection,
and that there are neither angels nor spirits,
but the Pharisees believe all these things.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 바리새인들은 이 모든 것을 믿는다.
